name: 3D Space Shooter (made in 48 hours)
description:
There are no start menus or well done screens because I was too lazy. When you die, the camera automatically switches to an enemy's.

When in first person camera, the gold circles indicate how many enemies there are left, and the gold bar indicates your remaining health.

Controls:

Forwards/Backwards, Yaw: W, A, S, D

Pitch, Roll: Numpad 8, 4, 5, 6

Shoot: Space

Change Camera: Shift
